name: Deep Sea Adventures (itch)
description:
Deep Sea Adventures is my Entry for LD48!

In this game you control a submarine and try to fish with a Harpoon while watching out for your oxygen and fuel.

Instructions:

Shoot: Space

Move: Arrows

Grab oxygen by surfacing the submarine.

Thats all!

Sadly i could get only two levels done and could not get to sound.. But that was an awesome ride! I will probably work more on it on the next weeks, so I can add the map with more locations and fishes!!
